MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:19pm. Our engineers are now making their way to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:42pm on Saturday, 20th February 2021
